item.title: Iranian Director Mohammad Rasoulof Says ‘Everything Is Ready’ if He Makes Next Film in ‘Europe or in the West’
item.description: Iranian director Mohammad Rasoulof, whose “The Seed of the Sacred Fig” was Oscar nominated, is considering making a film in another language. “If I’d want to make a film in Europe ri

item.title: Ex-NSA Chief Paul Nakasone Has a Warning for the Tech World
item.description: At the Defcon security conference in Las Vegas on Friday, Nakasone tried to thread the needle in a politically fraught moment while hinting at major changes for the tech community around the corner.

item.title: Ex-NSA Chief Paul Nakasone Has a Warning for the Tech World
item.description: At the Defcon security conference in Las Vegas on Friday, Nakasone tried to thread the needle in a politically fraught moment while hinting at major changes for the tech community around the corner.
